resources.string: Welcome to the FC Barcelona Quiz
You have to answer 8 questions about FCB
What is the name of FCB stadium?
Who is the actual coach of FC Barcelona?
what famous player of FCB started playing on Real Madrid on 2000, annoying a lot the fans of FCB?
How are called the FCB fans?(2 correct answers)
In Barcelona there is another important team, his rival in the local derby. Which is this team?
What has been the most expensive signing in the history of the FCB?
Which one is the shield of FCB?
